verses.name: John 7:25
verses.text: Then said some of them of Jerusalem, Is not this he, whom they seek to kill?

verses.name: John 7:26
verses.text: But, lo, he speaketh boldly, and they say nothing unto him. Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ?

verses.name: John 7:27
verses.text: Howbeit we know this man whence he is: but when Christ cometh, no man knoweth whence he is.

verses.name: John 7:28
verses.text: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught, saying, Ye both know me, and ye know whence I am: and I am not come of myself, but he that sent me is true, whom ye know not.
